main.name: Raheman Project
main.description: I am a DevOps engineer. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: Hello All, My Name is Mohammad Athiqur Raheman. I am from Tenali, Andhra Pradesh. We are four people in our family. Father is working as Private employee in RDO office, Sister Married & Mother is a home-maker. Currently working as Cloud Architect.
main.contactmessage: Hi There, Develop your skills asap

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Learned and done hands-on with Java, OOPS Concepts, Basic HTML,CSS&JS with one project on predictive analysis on Stock Market
Done Degree on Mathematics, Physics & Chemistry with some local languages like Hindi.

work.title: DevOps Engineer
work.description: Worked on NestJs, NodeJs, TypeScript, TypeORM, AWS, Github, Docker, CI CD & ReactJs

work.title: Systems Analyst
work.description: Worked as Systems Analyst with basic Linux administration.
